channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for VT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for VT

item.title: Report X-2023101127
item.description:
Report X-2023101127

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-23T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-11
  • City: SOUTH BURLINGTON
  • State: VT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The unload manager discovered little dots of liquid on the NC Belt around the package. It was pulled to the side and properly contained with a Red Hazmat bin for further inspection by QA. DescribePack: On the sides it looks like the body of the drum is defective as it leaks small amounts of liquid. Very small. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Contained with a Hazmat Bin`
